about.name: Audrey Thornal
about.title: Game Designer & Developer
about.bio: CS & Game Design student at Northeastern University passionate about creating immersive interactive experiences. I combine technical skills with creative storytelling to build games and applications that engage and inspire.

projects.title: Fortunes in the Dark
projects.description: Horror survival RPG where you play as a lost traveler navigating a mysterious forest with limited resources. Currently in development for Northeastern's CAMD Fall Showcase, transitioning from analog prototype to digital game.

projects.title: What Remains of Me
projects.description: Puzzle platformer where you play as Atlas, a reactivated robot exploring an abandoned post-apocalyptic facility. Led project management team of 5, implementing Agile methodologies and driving 3000% TikTok growth for GDC 2025 showcase. Published to Steam.

projects.title: Wallace - Historical Interactive Fiction
projects.description: An immersive Gilded Age branching narrative game that explores historical themes through player choices and multiple storylines.

projects.title: Pact - AI-Powered Habit Tracking App
projects.description: Cross-platform mobile app leveraging AI to match users for personalized habit tracking. Built full-stack MVP with Google OAuth integration, featuring tailored recommendations and secure user authentication.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio built with React showcasing my work in game design, programming, and visual design.

projects.title: Character Design Collection
projects.description: A series of original character designs exploring diverse personalities and visual styles for game development.
